meanings.definition: To cook food until it turns brown.
meanings.sent1: I am browning the chicken for dinner.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys browning the meat before adding the sauce.
meanings.sent3: The chef was browning the onions with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The sun was browning the bread in the oven of the sky.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of browning garlic filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: The process of food turning brown when cooked.
meanings.sent1: The browning of the crust indicates the pie is ready.
meanings.sent2: Mom explained the browning of the edges of the cookies.
meanings.sent3: The browning of the banana surprised the monkey.
meanings.sent4: The browning of the leaves signaled the arrival of autumn.
meanings.sent5: The browning of the meat added flavor to the stew.

meanings.definition: The act of becoming brown in color.
meanings.sent1: The browning of the apple was gradual.
meanings.sent2: She observed the browning of the paper over time.
meanings.sent3: The browning of the bread made it look toasted.
meanings.sent4: The browning of the wood gave it a rustic charm.
meanings.sent5: The browning of the grass hinted at the changing season.
